Interrupts.Name: Reality Splinter
Interrupts.Trigger: The demon is damaged by a foe's ability.
Interrupts.Effects: After the ability resolves, the foe swaps places with the demon, teleporting.

Actions.Name: Invert
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 is inverted. At the end of that character's turn, their HP total becomes their total missing hp instead. If they are at full hp, this action has no effect.
